title: JW Player setup config options
description: Options supported by the jwplayer().setup(options) method.

type.$comment: In freewheel 'overlay' is used to return a different type of ad. A different property should have been used for this.

adRetry.description: adRetry should only be used with Strategy Rules/Placement Embeds.

interval.description: Time in ms to wait before retrying ad request.

cap.description: Max amount of retries allowed per ad break.

netBidPct.description: [ONLY RELEVANT FOR MEDIAGRID] Reflect the pct of the bid the publisher is receiving vs. JW. Used to adjust bid price to reflect the net CPM the publisher receives

extensions.description: Pass callback functions to modify ad object using ad extensions tags from xml

ignorePlaylistSchedules.description: If true the ad plugin will ignore any playlist-item defined adschedules

oneOf.$comment: When `advertising.schedule` is an object, each property must be an ad object. `advertising` properties should not be used as keys for ads.

skipoffset.description: ... string values are converted to numbers (seconds) in view/adskipbutton.js

oneOf.description: Waterfall tag arrays are only supported in vast.

sendMax.description: Includes only the targeting segment representing the highest metric value

sendIsIncluded.description: Includes only a segment indicating that the targeting is included

freewheelAdType.$comment: freewheel.ad.type does not match the spec for vast and googima.

oneOf.$comment: When `advertising.schedule` is an object, each property must be an ad object. `advertising` properties should not be used as keys for ads.

locale.description: The locale for the IMA SDK that specifies the language in which to display UI elements. Can be any two-letter ISO 639-1 code

allowedOmidVendors.$comment: Supported only in the vast plugin

conditionaladoptout.$comment: Supported only in the vast plugin

skipoffset.$comment: skipoffset is not supported in googima

deferAds.description: Ad rule to not play ads when page is inactive (VAST/IMA)

vpaidmode.$comment: vpaidmode is not supported in vast

type.$comment: freewheel.ad.type does not match the spec for vast and googima.

admessage.default: This ad will end in xx

badConnection.default: This video cannot be played because of a problem with your internet connection.

cantLoadPlayer.default: Sorry, the video player failed to load.

cantPlayInBrowser.default: The video cannot be played in this browser.

cantPlayVideo.default: This video file cannot be played.

liveStreamDown.default: The live stream is either down or has ended.

protectedContent.default: There was a problem providing access to protected content.

technicalError.default: This video cannot be played because of a technical error.

defaultLanguage.description: The default language to use if the Navigator.language is not present in the list of languages.

title.description: A collection of localized chapter titles.

group.description: The name of the group that this chapter belongs to. Facilitates a 2-level structure to chapters.

image.description: An image url for the chapter that is separate from the media's thumbnails.

time.description: The point in time from the start of the stream where the chapter begins.

fwassetid.$comment: Supported only in the freewheel plugin

preload.description: Indicates what data should be preloaded, if any.

default.description: Used to set html5 provider quality selection (multiple mp4 source) `levels[i].default`

file.description: The URL of a media resource to use.

liveSyncDuration.description: Edge of live delay, expressed in seconds (JW Player Defaults this to 25)

streamtype.$comment: Supported only in the freewheel plugin

debug.$comment: There is no debug option in related

showButton.description: Hide the controlbar button that opens the playlist overlay (not the related overlay).

function.$comment: This property expects a JavaScript function

width.description: Image or video thumbnail width described in pixels or percentage.

allowFullscreen.description: Specifies whether or not to enable fullscreen capability/UI

sdkplatform.description: Support is implemented in analytics plugin and commercial controller that copies this value to the top level config.

strategyId.description: An identifier referencing a specific predetermined outcome from a strategy

evaluationId.description: Client side unique hash that is generated each time a strategy outcome is determined

placementId.description: A property level unique identifier which is used to reference a location on the webpage.

embedId.dscription: Client side unique hash that is generated for each Embed of a placement location

aspectratio.description: When width is a percentage, use this aspect ratio to calculate player height.

viewability.description: Autopause playback when the player is not viewable, and resume once the player is viewable again.

pauseAds.description: Augments 'viewability' option by making ads also pause when not viewable.

autostart.description: Autostart playback once the first playlist item is ready or once the player is viewable.

cmcd.description: Set to enable CMCD reporting in media requests with HLS.js and Shaka.

controls.description: Load and display the player controls.

displaydescription.description: Display the playlist item description when the player is idle and paused.

displayHeading.description: Display heading on top of the player.

displayPlaybackLabel.description: Display localization for playback when the player is idle.

displaytitle.description: Display the playlist item title when the player is idle and paused.

enableDefaultCaptions.description: Display first available captions by default if player is muted when autostarted

floating.description: Transform the player to a floating player if it is not visible.

dismissible.description: Display close button for floating player

showTitle.description: Shows video title when player is floating

fullscreenOrientationLock.description: Configure fullscreen orientation behavior on Android

debug.description: Set debug to true to enable the `onGaTrack` callback. See `onGaTrack` for more info.

gtag.$comment: This property expects a string or a function.
gtag.description: The name or reference to the gtag.js tracking global.

label.description: The playlist item property to use as the tracking event's `label`. Defaults to 'file` which sends the video url as the label for each event.

onGaTrack.description: A debug callback envoked directly after each GA tracking call which is passed an object with the tracking arguments `type`, `category`, `action`, `label`, and `nonInteraction`.

universalga.description: The name of the univeral GA global function. Defaults to `ga` when using Google's analytics.js.

useUniversalAnalytics.description: Use UA plugin instead of GA4 plugin.

sendEnhancedEvents.description: Toggle to send GA data in UA format rather than GA4 format. NOTE: UA will be deprecated by 7/1/2023.

generateSEOMetadata.description: Whether or not the player should add ld+json seo information to the head of the page

height.description: Player height described in pixels or percentage.

liveMaxLatencyDuration.description: Seconds from the edge that the player will seek back to whenever the next fragment to be loaded is older than N-10

liveSyncDurationCount.description: Edge of live delay, expressed in multiple of EXT-X-TARGETDURATION

liveMaxLatencyDurationCount.description: Multiple of EXT-X-TARGETDURATION that the player will seek back to whenever the next fragment to be loaded is older than N-10 (Defaults to Infinity. The player will not catch up if it falls behind)

horizontalVolumeSlider.description: Display a horizontal volume slider. If false, the default vertical one will be displayed except for controlbar-only audio players.

intl.description: Contains the localization options for each for language codes

key.description: Player license key. When decoded contains the account token, player edition, and key expiration date.

oneOf.description: Set to 0 to disable live streams from timing out
Time out live streams once the buffer is empty, and 30 seconds of network inactivity

liveTimeout.description: Time out live streams once the buffer is empty, and a period of network inactivity has passed as determined by the player

nextupoffset.description: The offset from the start of the video at which the Next Up card is displayed. If `nextupoffset` is a negative number, the offset is from the end of the video.

pad.description: A string written to the player config by platform A/B testing

ph.description: Platform Hosted Endpoint enum. Describes the type of endpoint used to embed the player. 0: Self Hosted, 1: Cloud Player, 2: WordPress Plugin, 3: Singleline Embed, 4: Showcase (self-hosted), 5: Showcase (hosted), 6: Sharing Page, 7: Sharing Page (with Password).

pid.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

playbackRateControls.description: Replaces playbackRates when set to an array.

playlistIndex.description: Override default playlist item index of `0`.

selectedBitrate.description: Used to disable adaptive bitrate mode and select the nearest quality level.

showUIWhen.description: Use onContent to hide the player UI until content/ads can be rendered.

stretching.description: How video is stretched to fit inside the player.

timeSlider.description: Enables the new timeslider and allows for toggling the thumb or knob

preferChapterImages.description: Chapter images override thumbnail images in tooltip display

width.description: Player width described in pixels or percentage.
